tool_description: This API provides access to Google popular times data, allowing users to see how busy a location typically is at different times of the day.

api_list.name: Search a Place
api_list.description: Search for a location using the same query format as Google. The API will return data only if the search yields a 'Popular Times' graph.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The name and address of the location you want to search for.
